name: Granbull

attacks.name: Cruel Crunch
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokemon doesn't have any Energies attached to it,this attack deals 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Play Rough
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads,deal 20 more damage. If tails,Snubbull takes 10 less damage from all sources next turn.

flavor: It is timid in spite of its looks. If it becomes enraged, however, it will strike with its huge fangs.
